title: Prohibits the issuance to or holding of thoroughbred track, harness track or video gaming licenses by persons convicted of moral turpitude felonies
summary: Prohibits the issuance to or holding of thoroughbred track, harness track or video gaming licenses by persons convicted of a felony involving moral turpitude; applies also to certain transfers of stock; directs the state racing and wagering board to share pertinent information with the division of the lottery.
lawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law and the tax law, in relation to making persons convicted of certain felonies ineligible for thoroughbred racing, harness racing and video lottery gaming licenses
